channel.title: How to make a redirector in flash 8?
channel.description: Hi, how can i make a flash redirector in macromedia flash 8? (a reirector in flash 8, so i can save it in .swf upload to imageshack then use the link to redirector to another site)

item.title: How to make a redirector in flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

jme_009:

It cant get anymore straight forward then that though.

Thats what I try to do simplicity and right in the face

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a redirector in flash 8?

item.title: How to make a redirector in flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

usernamelol:

Nah hes trying to make it so a imageshack link will redirect to somewhere…

yes, and it can be done in flash exactly how klop said it. On the first frame you simply make it go to that url. Then you upload the swf to imageshack.

It cant get anymore straight forward then that though.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a redirector in flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Okay, i didn’t have flash open before, but click on the first fram and go to actions and put this in there

getURL("http://www,google.com", "_parent"); and it should reloacate the browser to open google.com I hope that helps you

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a redirector in flash 8?

item.title: How to make a redirector in flash 8?
item.dc:creator: @PI55ED PI55ED
item.description:
@PI55ED wrote:

Thanks, but can you explain a little more please?
I did had one that worked it went something like this

<META HTTP-EQUIV="refresh" content="1;URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php">
but now i get a error.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

you make it so on the first frame(you can do this easily with the script helper thingy, click on something like goToURL(); then place the url, and have it on _parrent so it redirects it
